p: Methods: A retrospective study was carried out in the Emergency department, Alkhor hospital, HMC from April 2014 to May 2015 (14170/14). All patients above age of 18Â yrs diagnosed to have Neurocysticercosis from August 2005 to December 2013 were included in the study. Data were retrieved from medical record department and electronic data base. This included baseline demography, clinical presentation and radiological findings.
